comment: How can the Jewish state of Israel be the "Holy Land?" Israel is full of Abortion clinics and Gay pride parades. Preaching the gospel of Jesus is illegal in Israel. Israel is NOT the Holy Land
amr:
# ::snt How can the Jewish state of Israel be the "Holy Land?" Israel is full of Abortion clinics and Gay pride parades. Preaching the gospel of Jesus is illegal in Israel. Israel is NOT the Holy Land
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / possible-01
            :ARG1 (n / name
                  :op1 "Holy"
                  :op2 "Land")
            :manner (a / amr-unknown))
      :snt2 (f / fill-01
            :ARG1 (c / country
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Israel")
                  :mod (r / religious-group
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Jew")))
            :ARG2 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (c2 / clinic
                        :mod (a3 / abort-01))
                  :op2 (p2 / parade-02
                        :ARG1 (p3 / pride-01
                              :ARG0 (p4 / person
                                    :ARG1-of (g / gay-01))))))
      :snt3 (l / legal-02
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (p5 / preach-01
                  :ARG1 (g2 / gospel
                        :poss (p6 / person
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "Jesus"))))
            :location c)
      :snt4 (l2 / land
            :polarity -
            :name (n5 / name
                  :op1 "Holy"
                  :op2 "Land")
            :domain c))
